description:
When Inspector Nakamori catches a glimpse of Kaito`s face during an attempted robbery, the young magician has to "prove" he`s not Kid the Phantom Thief by going on a date with Aoko at the same time Kid is supposed to make his next appearance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un repos éreintant pour Kaitô Kuroba
黒羽快斗の忙しい休日
